instructions: Strictly base all content on the provided inputs and knowledge base.
Do not invent or hallucinate facts, figures, or dates.
If information is missing, explicitly state that it is not available in the context.
Ensure tone, style, and formatting match a professional humanitarian concept note.
when referencing donor, use donor name and never  donor_id
when referencing outcomes, use outcome name and never  outcome_id
when referencing, field context, use field_context name and never field context_id

sections.instructions: Briefly summarize the crisis/emergency context, humanitarian needs, target population, and key proposed activities. Focus on the core value proposition of the project.
Justify the project: What is the emergency? Why is this response necessary now? What is the gap being addressed?
Describe the main proposed interventions, expected outputs, and intended impact on the affected population.
Briefly describe coordination with government and other humanitarian actors, and the roles of key partners.
Provide a high-level budget breakdown by major category.

columns.name: Category
columns.instructions: Major budget category (e.g., Staffing, Supplies, Grants).
